name: 蕭立帆
objective:
分享 30 多年來在半導體、電子材料、軟磁材料與特殊鋼產業上的技術與經驗。主要的應用是在人工智慧 AI, 電動車、智慧手機、5G 通訊、電子、汽車、航太、太陽能及風電。期待能引導學生了解台灣產業的優勢，進而激發對材料研究與產品開發的創新思維，強化對學術或產業職涯的規劃。
To share 30+ years of technical experience in various industries like semiconductors, electronic materials, soft magnetic materials, and specialty steels for applications on artificial intelligence (AI), EVs, smartphones, 5G communication, electronics, automobiles, aerospace, solar, and wind. It will guide the students to understand the strengths of Taiwan in these industries, inspire them in materials innovation through research and product development, and help them pursue their careers in the future.
schedule:
Self Introduction
Major Industries related to Materials in Taiwan
Introduction of Materials
Alloy Elements and its Effect
3rd Generation Semiconductor (Factory Tour to 穩晟材料)
EV and its Market
Soft Magnetic Materials and Its Applications
Brazing Materials and Its Applications
Clad Metals for Heat Sink and Bimetal Alloy
Specialty Steels
Nickel Base Superalloys and Its Applications
Tool Steels
Fastener
Low CTE (Coefficient of Thermal Expansion) Invar 36
Copper Strip and Its Applications
Environmental Social Governance
